free pattern download from novita available in ohdake/ english 1 ohdake-neulepusero/ finnish 2 tistel - tröjan swedish 3 in burda stricken # 25 pullover im jaquardmuster ******************* ohdake is a top-down sweater knitted from novita muumitalo with a stunning black and white colourwork yoke **gauge** 10 cm x 10 cm 24 sts x 26 rds - stranded pattern 23 sts x 32 rds - stockinette stitch *********************************************************************** | finished
